metadata.synopsis: Jaheira mentions the special guards waiting and protecting the downstairs.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go into Wyrm's Rock, towards Gortash- Jaheira comments

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: The patriars leave their guard dogs below. They must feel safe around the Steel Watch indeed.
0.context: NodeContext: Quirked eyebrow - Gortash must have the nobility well and truly fooled if they're willing to leave their personal bodyguards outside the ceremony room.
